document.full_text: top commodity trader glencore's planned $12 billion london listing has long been seen as the first step to merging with xstrata , in what could be the biggest mining takeover in history.
document.title: glencore's bumper ipo paves way for deals
lines_and_colors: top commodity trader glencore's planned $12 billion london listing has long been seen as the first step to merging with xstrata , in what could be the biggest mining takeover in history.
